predicate.note: Frames file for 'prosper' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: live long and...
example.text: Prospective bond buyers noted that TW historically has prospered because it has been willing to spend aggressively on remodeling restaurants and redoing menus.
